title: West Ham 0-1 Newcastle United: Guimaraes gets Howe´s side back to winning ways
description: Bruno Guimaraes was the hero as Newcastle United boosted their Champions League qualifying hopes with a 1-0 win over West Ham. The Magpies skipper scored the only goal to settle a closely fought contest at the London Stadium, ahead of their EFL Cup final against Liverpool on Sunday. Alphonse Areola produced a magnificent save, springing […] The post West Ham 0-1 Newcastle United: Guimaraes gets Howe´s side back to winning ways appeared first on Soccer News.
author: SoccerNews

title: Liverpool not playing for a draw against ´incredible´ PSG, says Slot
description: Arne Slot insisted that his Liverpool team will look to win rather than defend their 1-0 lead against Paris Saint-Germain in their Champions League last 16 tie on Tuesday. Harvey Elliott’s 87th-minute strike snatched a victory for the Reds at the Parc des Princes in the first leg, having been dominated by PSG for most […] The post Liverpool not playing for a draw against ´incredible´ PSG, says Slot appeared first on Soccer News.
